name: Humbled Boris Johnson follows Europe with UK lockdown
description: But the United Kingdom, the country most punished in Europe with more than 46,500 deaths confirmed by covid-19, sees a second wave beating strongly. On Saturday it exceeded one million positives: 1,011,660 cases of Covid-19 since the beginning of the year.
